name: Cloudius - Demo
description:
Climb back the mountain with the power of... Creating clouds?! 
Cloudius is a mythological 2D Collect-A-Thon, about meeting expectations climbing and mountain with the power of clouds. 
Cloudius's father was worried about his son, he thought he wasn't ready to take his place and be the god of the sky. So he threw him off the mountain. and took all his powers, except one.
...
Creating Clouds?!
--        
Cloudius is a game made by Itayt and Razivo, this demo is the first chapter of the game. You can follow the development of the game by joining our Discord
https://discord.gg/C5rkrYQkVQ
